summary:
Crystal Palace Football Club, often called Palace, is a professional team based in South London. They play in the Premier League, the top level of English football. The club was officially formed in 1905 but has older roots. They've played at Selhurst Park since 1924.

Palace has had many successes, including finishing third in the top league in 1991 and reaching the FA Cup final twice. They've mostly played in the top two tiers of English football. Their kit features red and blue vertical stripes. Palace has strong rivalries with Brighton, Millwall, and Charlton Athletic.
title: Crystal Palace F.C.
